main_topic.title: this requirement <= 9 hours run-time is for public dataset or private ?
main_topic.content:
this requirement

<= 9 hours run-time

is for public dataset or private ?

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: On submission you are running the whole test set, private and public. Therefore, if your submission finishes in 9 hours, and you see a score on LB, you have nothin to worry about.
comments.date: Posted a month ago  ·  38th in this Competition
